column4: How can I watch DVDs on my computer??  The player refuses because it thinks I'm trying to rip it
what player?   theres many players that can play dvd's
vlc and mplayer  (such as gnome-mplayer) can handle it. You Do need to install the decss stuff from medibuntu most likely
it has a 'repository' you want to add to your list of repositories for synaptics to use.  see  medibuntu docs
